dmca.title: Copyright Infringment at 69.56.135.122
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: support@inverseflow.com [mailto:support@inverseflow.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, February 02, 2005 4:29 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringment at 69.56.135.122




The Planet
1333 Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207

Thursday, September 02, 2004

Name: H2desk.com/69.56.135.122/HEATHCOSOFT.COM
ISP: ThePlanet

Via Fax/Email

RE: Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Inverseflow Helpdesk System

Date of Infringement: 25th January 2005 07:29:7 EDT (GMT -0400)




Dear CEO,


Inverseflow.com is the owner of  Inverseflow Helpdesk system which is
located at
http://www.inverseflow.com . We have received information that, at the above
noted date and time, H2desk.com/69.56.135.122/HEATHCOSOFT.COM has made
avaliable Illegal copies of Inverseflow.com Helpdesk on its website. Ilegal
copies are made avliable here :

http://www.h2desk.com/pmos

This is a infringing material which is freely made avaliable on this site .
The
unauthorized distribution or public performance of copyrighted Inverseflow
Helpdesk system constitutes copyright infringement under the Copyright Act,
Title 17 United States Code Section 106(3)-(4). This conduct may also
violate
the laws of other countries, international law, and/or treaty obligations.

As the owner of this IP address, we request that you immediately do the fol
lowing:

1. Disable server of h2desk.com/69.56.135.122/HEATHCOSOFT.COM
2. Remove or disable access to the material identified above.
3. Take appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse Poli
cy/Terms of Service Agreement.

On behalf of the respective owners of the exclusive rights to the copyright
ed material at issue in this notice, we hereby state, pursuant to the Digit
al Millennium Copyright Act, Title 17 United States Code Section 512, that
the information in this notification is accurate and that we have a good
faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not
authorized by the copyright owners, their respective agents, or the law.

Also pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, we hereby state, und
er penalty of perjury, that we are authorized to act on behalf of the owner
s of the exclusive rights being infringed as set forth in this notification


----- End forwarded message -----
